titles.title: Dillonwood Giant Sequoia Grove Park Expansion Act
To authorize an expansion of the boundaries of Sequoia National Park to include Dillonwood Giant Sequoia Grove.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands.
Mr. Hansen moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H.R. 4020.

At the conclusion of debate, the chair put the question on the motion to suspend the rules. Mr. Miller, George objected to the vote on the grounds that a quorum was not present. Further proceedings on the motion were postponed until Oct. 31. The point of no quorum was withdrawn.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
The title of the measure was amended. Agreed to without objection.
Measure laid before Senate by unanimous consent.

vote.text: Passed Senate with an amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Mr. Radanovich asked unanimous consent that the House agree to the Senate amendment.

vote.text: On motion that the House agree to the Senate amendment Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 12/15/2000--Passed Senate amended. Requires the Secretary of the Interior to acquire by donation, purchase with donated or appropriated funds, or exchange all interest in and to specified land (Dillonwood Giant Sequoia Grove) for addition to Sequoia National Park, California.
